00025 #ifndef _ROBOT_CONTROL_IKOR_IKSOLVER_
00026 #define _ROBOT_CONTROL_IKOR_IKSOLVER_
00027 
00028 #include <robot/control/ikor/ikor>
00029 
00030 #include <base/ReferencedObject>
00031 #include <base/Expression>
00032 #include <robot/control/ikor/RankDefSolver>
00033 #include <robot/control/ikor/ManipulatorState>
00034 
00035 
00036 namespace robot {
00037 namespace control {
00038 namespace ikor {
00039 
00043 class IKSolver : public base::ReferencedObject
00044 {
00045 public:
00046   IKSolver(ref<ManipulatorState> manipState);
00047 
00048   virtual String className() const { return String("IKSolver"); }
00049   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj IKSolver(*this); } 
00050 
00051 
00052   enum OptimizationCriterion { LeastNorm, LeastFlow };
00053   enum OptimizationMethod { Lagrangian, BangBang, Simplex };
00054 
00055   /*
00056    * Takes current the joint parameters (q) and the required change in
00057    *  end-effector position (dx) and returns the changes in joint 
00058    *  parameters (dq) that will achieve the requested dx.
00059    *  Uses the provided solver for an underdetermined system (solver)
00060    *   the specified optimization method and criteria and the
00061    *   Jacobian matrix expression (J).
00062    */
00063   Vector solve(const Vector& dx, const Vector& q,
00064                const base::ExpressionMatrix& J,
00065                ref<RankDefSolver>  solver, 
00066                OptimizationCriterion optCriterion = LeastNorm,
00067                OptimizationMethod    optMethod = Lagrangian);
00068 
00069 protected:
00070   IKSolver(const IKSolver& iks) {}
00071 
00072   ref<ManipulatorState> manipState;
00073 
00074   Int M, N; 
00075   Int Mred, Nred; 
00076   Matrix g; 
00077   Matrix Qarray; 
00078   Matrix Xelim;  
00079   Matrix betaall; 
00080   Int cn; 
00081   
00082 };
00083 
00084 
00085 } // namespace ikor
00086 } // namespace control
00087 } // namespace robot

00089 #endif
